Symbol.Script_2D:
project2 3,270,2 if show_type=SHOW_3D and yRot_r=90 then
endif
if (type_hole=2 or type_hole=3) and yRot_r=90 then if abs(coord_hole[1])<abs(coord_hole[2]) then max_r=-coord_hole[2] else max_r=-coord_hole[1] endif HOTSPOT2 max_r, 0, unID, ang_hole, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, ang_hole, 6+512*(yRot=90): unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 max_r*cos(-ang_hole)*0.6, max_r*sin(-ang_hole)*0.6, unID, ang_hole, 5: unID=unID+1 rot2 -ang_hole if type_hole=2 then HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -coord_hole[1], 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, coord_hole[1], 3: unID=unID+1 else HOTSPOT2 0, 0 endif HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -coord_hole[2], 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 1, 0, unID, coord_hole[2], 3: unID=unID+1 del 1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, halfa_washer_bg, 1+128,a_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 halfa_washer_bg, 0, unID, halfa_washer_bg, 2,a_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 -1, 0, unID, halfa_washer_bg, 3,a_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, 0, unID, halfb_washer_bg, 1+128,b_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, halfb_washer_bg, unID, halfb_washer_bg, 2,b_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT2 0, -1, unID, halfb_washer_bg, 3,b_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 endif if show_hole2D then if yRot_r=90 and show_type<>SHOW_TOP and show_type<>SHOW_3D then if type_hole=1 then circle2 0,0,holeSizeR HOTARC2 0, 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 hotspot2 0,holeSizeR,9006 hotspot2 0,-holeSizeR,9007 hotspot2 holeSizeR,0,9008 hotspot2 -holeSizeR,0,9009 endif if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then rot2 -ang_hole PUT 0,holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[1],0,900 PUT 0,180,4001 PUT -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,1 PUT -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,1 if type_hole=2 then PUT -coord_hole[2],0,900 PUT 0,180,4001 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR,0,9010 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2]+holeSizeR,0,9011 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,9012 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,9013 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,9014 hotspot2 -coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,9015 HOTARC2 -coord_hole[1], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 HOTARC2 -coord_hole[2], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9006 else PUT -coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,1 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR,0 hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR hotspot2 -coord_hole[1],holeSizeR HOTARC2 -coord_hole[1], 0, holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9005 endif PUT 0,holeSizeR,-1 poly2_ NSP/3, 1+4,get(NSP) del 1 endif if show_hole_axis then if type_hole=1 then line2 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis line2 -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 endif if type_hole=2 then rot2 -ang_hole line2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,-coord_hole[2]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 line2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis line2 -coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis endif if type_hole=3 then rot2 -ang_hole line2 -coord_hole[1]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,-coord_hole[2]+zas_axis,0 line2 -coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,-coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis endif endif endif endif
Symbol.Script_3D:
hotspot 0,0,0,900 if GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE=1 or GLOB_PREVIEW_MODE=2 or GLOB_FEEDBACK_MODE=1 then res = 9 bChamfer=0 show_thread=0 else if GLOB_SEO_TOOL_MODE = 1 then res = 19 else if res<3 then res=13 endif endif show_res=res SHADOW OFF, OFF resol show_res material gs_ifc_mat pen gs_cont_pen model solid rotx yRot strart_hole=hp if show_hole then ADDZ strart_hole-0.001 if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then if abs(coord_hole[1])<abs(coord_hole[2]) then max_r=coord_hole[2] else max_r=coord_hole[1] endif HOTSPOT max_r, 0,insideLength, unID, ang_hole, 4+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, insideLength, unID, ang_hole, 6: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 1, unID, ang_hole, 7: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT max_r*cos(ang_hole)*0.6, max_r*sin(ang_hole)*0.6,insideLength, unID, ang_hole, 5: unID=unID+1 rotz ang_hole if type_hole=2 then HOTSPOT 0, 0, insideLength, unID, coord_hole[1], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT coord_hole[1], 0, insideLength, unID, coord_hole[1], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, insideLength, unID, coord_hole[1], 3: unID=unID+1 endif HOTSPOT 0, 0, insideLength, unID, coord_hole[2], 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT coord_hole[2], 0, insideLength, unID, coord_hole[2], 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0, insideLength, unID, coord_hole[2], 3: unID=unID+1 del 1 endif if show_hole_axis and show_type = NOT_SHOW then if type_hole=1 then lin_ 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0 lin_ -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0 lin_ 0,-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,0,holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ -holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 endif if type_hole=2 then rotz ang_hole lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0,coord_hole[2]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,0 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2]-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[2],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 del 1 endif if type_hole=3 then rotz ang_hole lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,0 lin_ coord_hole[1],holeSizeR+zas_axis,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR-zas_axis,insideLength+0.001 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,0,coord_hole[2]-zas_axis,0,0 lin_ coord_hole[1]+holeSizeR+zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001,coord_hole[2]-zas_axis,0,insideLength+0.001 del 1 endif endif del 1 endif if GLOB_SEO_TOOL_MODE = 1 and show_type<>SHOW_TOP and show_type<>SHOW_SIDE and show_hole and show_res>9 then ADDZ strart_hole-0.001 if type_hole=1 then cylind insideLength+0.001, holeSizeR endif if type_hole=2 or type_hole=3 then rotz ang_hole PUT 0,holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[1],holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[1],0,915 PUT 0,-180,4015 PUT coord_hole[1],-holeSizeR,15 PUT coord_hole[2],-holeSizeR,15 if type_hole=2 then PUT coord_hole[2],0,915 PUT 0,-180,4015 else PUT coord_hole[2],holeSizeR,15 endif PUT 0,holeSizeR,-1 prism_ NSP/3,insideLength+0.001,get(NSP) del 1 endif del 1 end endif
roty -90 call "Условный_болт" PARAMETERS ALL show_type=show_type, insideLength=insideLength, flatWidth=flatWidth, amg2d=amg2d del 1
if show_type = NOT_SHOW and show_res>9 then HOTARC holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9010 addx insideLength hotspot 0,0,0,9011 HOTARC holeSizeR, 0, 360, 9012 del 1 end endif
put -flatWidth/2, -flatWidth/2*tan(30) , 15, -flatWidth/2, flatWidth/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , flatWidth/(2*cos(30)), 15, flatWidth/2, flatWidth/2*tan(30) , 15, flatWidth/2, -flatWidth/2*tan(30) , 15, 0 , -flatWidth/(2*cos(30)), 15, -flatWidth/2, -flatWidth/2*tan(30) , -1, 0 , 0 , 900, ! smooth hole diaB/2, 0 , 79, diaB/2, 360-stepAng, 4000+79, diaB/2, 0 , -1 group "Nut" prism_ nsp/3, nutThick, get(nsp) endgroup group "nChamfer" mulz -1 gosub 350 del 1 body -1 addz nutThick gosub 350 del 1 endgroup
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, lsv-l0, unID: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, lsv, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, lsv, unID, lsv, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0 ,0, -1, unID, lsv, 3: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0, 0, unID, hp, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, hp, unID, hp, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0 ,0, -1, unID, hp, 3: unID=unID+1
HOTSPOT 0, 0,hp+insideLength+t_washer_bg, unID, halfa_washer_bg, 1+128,a_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT halfa_washer_bg, 0,hp+insideLength+t_washer_bg, unID, halfa_washer_bg, 2,a_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT -1, 0,hp+insideLength+t_washer_bg, unID, halfa_washer_bg, 3,a_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0,hp+insideLength+t_washer_bg, unID, halfb_washer_bg, 1+128,b_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, halfb_washer_bg,hp+insideLength+t_washer_bg, unID, halfb_washer_bg, 2,b_washer_bg: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, -1,hp+insideLength+t_washer_bg, unID, halfb_washer_bg, 3,b_washer_bg: unID=unID+1
if dnut then addz hp-t_washer_bg if t_washer_bg>0 then gosub "pl_washer_bg" addz -washerThick gosub "pl_washer" addz -nutThick gosub "pl_nut" del 3 endif
HOTSPOT 0, 0, hp, unID, insideLength, 1+128: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0, 0, hp+insideLength, unID, insideLength, 2: unID=unID+1 HOTSPOT 0 ,0, -1, unID, insideLength, 3: unID=unID+1
addz hp+insideLength if t_washer_bg>0 then gosub "pl_washer_bg" addz t_washer_bg endif gosub "pl_washer" addz washerThick gosub "pl_nut" addz nutThick rotz 90 gosub "pl_nut" del top
rotx yRot !!!--------Часть болта, находящаяся над заделкой MATERIAL m2 lt = lsv-l0 if lt>0 then CYLIND lt, rb !Часть болта без резбьы addz lt MATERIAL m1 CYLIND l0, rb-0.0005 !Часть болта с резьбой del top !!!--------
if GLOB_VIEW_TYPE=2 or not(show_thread) then end
rotx yRot if tip = "с отгибом" then MATERIAL m3 lt = hz-rz-d addz -lt+(lsv-l0)*((lsv-l0)<0) CYLIND lt, rb addz -rb-rz rotz 90 addx rb+rz roty -90 ELBOW rz+rb, 90, rb del 3 rotx 90 addz -rb-rz-l CYLIND l, rb endif
if tip = "прямой" then MATERIAL m3 lt = hz addz -lt CYLIND lt, rb endif
if tip = "с анк. плитой" then MATERIAL m3 lt = hz-l0 addz -lt CYLIND lt, rb MATERIAL m1 lt = l0 addz -lt CYLIND lt, rb hotspot 0,0,0 gosub "pl_nut" endif del top end 350: nutRad = abs(nutThick) put 0 , nutRad , 2, nutRad-flatWidth/2, 0.96*flatWidth/2, 2, nutRad-flatWidth/2, nutRad , 2, 0 , nutRad , -1 roty -90 addx -(nutRad-flatWidth/2) revolve nsp/3, 360, 1+2+4+8+16+32, get(nsp) del 2 return
"pl_nut": if not(bChamfer) then placegroup "Nut" if bChamfer then placegroup subgroup("Nut", "nChamfer") return
"pl_washer": prism_ 3, washerThick, 0 , 0 , 900+79, washerSize/2, 360, 4000+79, (diaB+0.004)/2, 360, 4000+79 return
"pl_washer_bg": prism_ 4, t_washer_bg, a_washer_bg/2,b_washer_bg/2,15, -a_washer_bg/2,b_washer_bg/2,15, -a_washer_bg/2,-b_washer_bg/2,15, a_washer_bg/2,-b_washer_bg/2,15 return
Symbol.Script_1D:
NOT_SET = -1 NOT_SHOW = 0 SHOW_3D = 1 SHOW_TOP = 2 SHOW_SIDE = 3
TemporaryB = 1 HstrengthB = 2 НanchorB = 3 ManchorB = 4 FoundB = 5
rz = diaB rb = diaB*0.5 unID=1 if l0tr <= l0 then m1 = "!Краска-06" m2 = "!Краска-15" m3 = "!Металл-Железо" else m1 = "!Краска-05" m2 = m1 m3 = m2 endif zas_axis=0.005 res=2 stepAng = 360/res
yRot_r = abs(yRot-90) MOD 180 if yRot_r=90 then rang = 0 else rang = abs(SYMB_ROTANGLE-360*SYMB_MIRRORED) MOD 360 endif
gs_detlevel_3D="" : success = LIBRARYGLOBAL ("Libraryflobals-km", "gs_detlevel_3D", gs_detlevel_3D) if gs_detlevel_3D = `Простой` then show_thread=0 bChamfer = 0 res = 5 else res = 36 bChamfer = 1 show_thread=1 endif holeSizeR = (diaB/2)+holeTolerance call "Показ_болтов" PARAMETERS ALL ang1=rang, ang2=yRot_r, el_view=el_view RETURNED_PARAMETERS show_type
Symbol.Script_PR: call "Спецификатор" parameters tip_el="40", subpos = subpos, pos = GLOB_ID, obozn=obozn, naen=naen, ves=ves, kol_vo_spec=1, komment="-"
Symbol.Script_VL:
call "Условный_болт" PARAMETERS ALL values "tip" "с отгибом", "с анк. плитой", "прямой"
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "halfa_washer_bg" then PARAMETERS a_washer_bg = halfa_washer_bg*2 else PARAMETERS halfa_washer_bg = a_washer_bg/2 endif
if GLOB_MODPAR_NAME = "halfb_washer_bg" then PARAMETERS b_washer_bg = halfb_washer_bg*2 else PARAMETERS halfb_washer_bg = b_washer_bg/2 endif
dim size_b[8] size_b[1] = 12/1000 size_b[2] = 16/1000 size_b[3] = 20/1000 size_b[4] = 24/1000 size_b[5] = 30/1000 size_b[6] = 36/1000 size_b[7] = 42/1000 size_b[8] = 48/1000
dim nut_b[8][7] !Диаметр гайки | ширина гайки | высота верха болта | диаметр шайбы | толщина шайбы nut_b[1][1] = 18: nut_b[1][2] = 10.8: nut_b[1][3] = 7.5: nut_b[1][4] = 24: nut_b[1][5] = 2.5 : nut_b[1][6] = 0.08 : nut_b[1][7] = 0.04 !12 nut_b[2][1] = 24: nut_b[2][2] = 14.8: nut_b[2][3] = 10: nut_b[2][4] = 30: nut_b[2][5] = 3 : nut_b[2][6] = 0.09 : nut_b[2][7] = 0.05 !16 nut_b[3][1] = 30: nut_b[3][2] = 18: nut_b[3][3] = 12.5: nut_b[3][4] = 37: nut_b[3][5] = 3 : nut_b[3][6] = 0.1 : nut_b[3][7] = 0.06 !20 nut_b[4][1] = 36: nut_b[4][2] = 21.5: nut_b[4][3] = 15: nut_b[4][4] = 44: nut_b[4][5] = 4 : nut_b[4][6] = 0.11 : nut_b[4][7] = 0.075 !24
nut_b[5][1] = 46: nut_b[5][2] = 25.6: nut_b[5][3] = 7.5: nut_b[5][4] = 56: nut_b[5][5] = 4 : nut_b[5][6] = 0.12 : nut_b[5][7] = 0.09 !30 nut_b[6][1] = 55: nut_b[6][2] = 31: nut_b[6][3] = 10: nut_b[6][4] = 66: nut_b[6][5] = 5 : nut_b[6][6] = 0.13 : nut_b[6][7] = 0.11 !36 nut_b[7][1] = 65: nut_b[7][2] = 34: nut_b[7][3] = 12.5: nut_b[7][4] = 78: nut_b[7][5] = 7 : nut_b[7][6] = 0.14 : nut_b[7][7] = 0.125 !42 nut_b[8][1] = 75: nut_b[8][2] = 38: nut_b[8][3] = 15: nut_b[8][4] = 92: nut_b[8][5] = 8 : nut_b[8][6] = 0.15 : nut_b[8][7] = 0.15 !48
values "diaB" size_b
inx = 1 for i=1 to vardim1(nut_b) if diaB = size_b[i] then inx = i next i
if not(spar) then if not(hdop) then PARAMETERS hmin = 25 * diaB PARAMETERS rnear = 6 * diaB PARAMETERS rfring = max(0.1, 4 * diaB) else PARAMETERS hmin = 30 * diaB PARAMETERS rnear = 4 * diaB PARAMETERS rfring = max(0.1, 2 * diaB) endif else
endif
shaftThick = size_b[inx] flatWidth = nut_b[inx][1]/1000 nutThick = nut_b[inx][2]/1000 washerSize = nut_b[inx][4]/1000 washerThick = nut_b[inx][5]/1000
PARAMETERS l0 = nut_b[inx][6] PARAMETERS l = nut_b[inx][7] PARAMETERS dl = hz+lsv PARAMETERS shaftThick = shaftThick, flatWidth = flatWidth, nutThick = nutThick, washerSize = washerSize, washerThick = washerThick PARAMETERS l0tr = round_int((nutThick*3 + washerThick + insideLength)*50)/50 values "lsv" range[hp+l0tr,hmin] if dnut then values "hp" range[washerThick+nutThick+t_washer_bg, lsv] else values "hp" range[0, lsv] endif values "insideLength" range[2/1000, lsv-hp-nutThick-washerThick]
PARAMETERS obozn = "ГОСТ 24379.1-2012 " PARAMETERS ves = (dl+l)*7850*3.14*(diaB)*(diaB) if tip = "с отгибом" then isp = " 1.1 " if tip = "с анк. плитой" then isp = " 2.1 " if tip = "прямой" then isp = " 5 " PARAMETERS naen = "Болт" + isp + "М" + str("%.0",diaB) + "x" + str("%.0mm",dl)
